title: Bai Yue Lixian Ji Zhi Zhuang Jin Mima
title_japanese: 百越历险记之壮锦密码
synopsis: At the beginning of its founding, the world was in chaos, and Pangu was born in it. The clear qi rises into the sky, the turbid qi sinks into the earth, Pangu sacrificially opens up the heavens and the earth. The Three Realms of the God Realm and the Devil Realm coexist without intruding each other. But the king of the demon world is greedy and delusional to unify the three realms. When the yin is prosperous and the yang is declining, use the magic disk to open the gate of the demon world and occupy the mortal world. Buluotuo, the creation god of the Zhuang ethnic group, had already predicted the coming of this day. (translated from iqiyi)
